sourcesContent:
List of folders ({{viewTitle}} View)

Folder id Folder name Folder description Folder creation date
{{folder.FolderId}} {{folder.FolderName}} {{folder.FolderDescription}} {{folder.CreationDate}}
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-folder-component", templateUrl: "./folder.component.html" }) export class FolderComponent { viewTitle: string = "Table"; folders: any[] = [ { "FolderId": 1, "FolderName": "1st folder!", "FolderDescription": "The very first folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" }, { "FolderId": 2, "FolderName": "2nd folder!", "FolderDescription": "The 2nd folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" }, { "FolderId": 3, "FolderName": "3rd folder!", "FolderDescription": "The very 3rd folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" } ] }
